Returns & Refunds.question: What is SwiftCart's return policy?
Returns & Refunds.answer: You can return most items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. The items must be in their original condition.

Returns & Refunds.question: How long does it take to process a refund?
Returns & Refunds.answer: Refunds are typically processed within 5–7 business days after we receive your return.

Returns & Refunds.question: Can I return items purchased on sale?
Returns & Refunds.answer: Yes, sale items can be returned unless marked as 'final sale'.

Shipping & Delivery.question: What shipping methods are available?
Shipping & Delivery.answer: We offer standard, express, and overnight shipping via multiple carriers.

Shipping & Delivery.question: How do I track my order?
Shipping & Delivery.answer: Once your order is shipped, you’ll receive a tracking number via email or SMS.

Shipping & Delivery.question: Do you ship internationally?
Shipping & Delivery.answer: Yes, SwiftCart ships to over 50 countries worldwide.

Payments & Billing.question: What payment methods are accepted?
Payments & Billing.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and SwiftCart gift cards.

Payments & Billing.question: When will my card be charged?
Payments & Billing.answer: Your card will be charged when your order is confirmed.

Payments & Billing.question: Can I get an invoice for my order?
Payments & Billing.answer: Yes, invoices are sent via email and are also available in your account dashboard.

Troubleshooting.question: I'm having trouble logging in.
Troubleshooting.answer: Ensure you're using the correct email and password. Try resetting your password if the issue persists.

Troubleshooting.question: My order hasn't arrived.
Troubleshooting.answer: Check the tracking link provided. If it's delayed beyond the estimated delivery date, contact our support.

Troubleshooting.question: The website isn’t loading correctly.
Troubleshooting.answer: Try clearing your browser cache or using a different browser. If the issue continues, contact support.

Product Warranty.question: Do products come with a warranty?
Product Warranty.answer: Yes, most electronics come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty. Other product warranties vary.

Product Warranty.question: How do I claim a warranty?
Product Warranty.answer: Contact support with your order number and a description of the issue. We’ll guide you through the process.

Account Management.question: How do I change my password?
Account Management.answer: Go to your account settings and click 'Change Password'. Follow the instructions.

Account Management.question: Can I delete my account?
Account Management.answer: Yes, contact support to request account deletion. We'll process your request within 7 days.

Account Management.question: How do I update my address?
Account Management.answer: Log in to your account, navigate to 'Addresses', and click 'Edit' next to the address you wish to update.

Company Policies.question: Is my data safe with SwiftCart?
Company Policies.answer: Yes, we follow industry-standard practices to protect your personal information and data.

Company Policies.question: Do you share customer data?
Company Policies.answer: No, we do not sell or rent customer data. We only share data with partners as needed to fulfill your order.

Company Policies.question: Where are SwiftCart’s terms and conditions?
Company Policies.answer: You can view our full terms and conditions on our website’s footer or at swiftcart.com/terms.
